label: applicableStandard
comment: A referenced standard applicable to this agricultural certificate.

rangeIncludes.comment: A referenced norm or requirement that establishes uniform criteria, methods, processes and practices, such as in engineering or technical areas.

domainIncludes.comment: A plan of action agreed or chosen in order to obey rules or requests made by people in authority and designed to prevent and detect violations of applicable law, regulations, rules and ethical standards by employees, agents and others.
